docs.title: Welcome to Saint Mary Coptic Orthdox church a nonprofitable organization
We are Saint Mary Coptic Orthdox.
Information about us
docs.text:
we are coptic orthdox christain a group of christian based in Egypt, 
our pop is Pope Tawadros II or Theodore II is the 118th 
and current pope of Alexandria and patriarch of the See 
of St. Mark, succeeding the late Pope Shenouda III 
as leader of the Coptic Orthodox Church of Alexandria.
He took office on 18 November 2012, two weeks after being selected
our main priest is father Shenouda Basta
who moved to America from Egypt years ago taking leading our church
he has been wokring incuredibly hard to build it with the help
of Jesus Christ and the help of our boarding members.
Dr. Mina Salib, Dr. Morkos Salib, ENG. Michael Eissa and Marco Faik Hanna.
our church is Located at 954 Cummins Pkwy, Des Moines, IA 50312
our main phone number is (515) 868-3099
